The Schwartz Law Group is an established Metro-Detroit area criminal defense law firm with nearly 30 years of experience in protecting clients and helping them preserve their freedom. Founded by Steven L. Schwartz, who has a reputation for treating clients fairly with respect and dedication, you can trust the Schwartz Law Group to take your case seriously. Specializing in cases with criminal charges, with focused areas of practice including OWI/DUI charges, misdemeanor and felony charges, driver's license restoration, assault, domestic violence cases, Federal charges, corporate fraud, and drug crimes. Find out how the Schwartz Law Group can handle your criminal defense case - call now.
